abilities.name: soul eater
abilities.description: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.

abilities.name: siphoning strike
abilities.description: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.

abilities.name: wither
abilities.description: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.

abilities.name: spirit fire
abilities.description: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.

abilities.name: fury of the sands
abilities.description: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance for the duration.
